verses.verse: זְב֣וּבֵי <S%H2070><s%> flies מָ֔וֶת <S%H4194><s%> Dead יַבְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H887><s%> a stinking savour יַבִּ֖יעַ <S%H5042><s%> to send forth שֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> cause the ointment רוֹקֵ֑חַ <S%H7543><s%> of the apothecary יָקָ֛ר <S%H3368><s%> him that is in reputation מֵחָכְמָ֥ה <S%H2451><s%> for wisdom מִכָּב֖וֹד <S%H3519><s%> [and] honour סִכְל֥וּת <S%H5531><s%> folly מְעָֽט׃ <S%H4592><s%> [so doth] a little

לֵ֤ב <S%H3820><s%> heart חָכָם֙ <S%H2450><s%> A wise man's לִֽימִינ֔וֹ <S%H3225><s%> [is] at his right hand וְלֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> heart כְּסִ֖יל <S%H3684><s%> but a fool's לִשְׂמֹאלֽוֹ׃ <S%H8040><s%> at his left

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even בַּדֶּ֛רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way [כְּשֶׁהַסָּכָל כ] (כְּשֶׁסָּכָ֥ל <S%H5530><s%> the fool ק) הֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walketh לִבּ֣וֹ <S%H3820><s%> his wisdom חָסֵ֑ר <S%H2638><s%> faileth וְאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> [him] and he saith לַכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> to everyone סָכָ֥ל <S%H5530><s%> Yea also when he that is a fool הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If ר֤וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> If the spirit הַמּוֹשֵׁל֙ <S%H4910><s%> of the ruler תַּעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> rise up עָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> against מְקוֹמְךָ֖ <S%H4725><s%> not thy place אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּנַּ֑ח <S%H3240><s%> against thee leave כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because מַרְפֵּ֔א <S%H4832><s%> for yielding יַנִּ֖יחַ <S%H3240><s%> pacifieth חֲטָאִ֥ים <S%H2399><s%> offences גְּדוֹלִֽים׃ <S%H1419><s%> great

יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> There is רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> an evil רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> [which] I have seen תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> under the sun כִּשְׁגָגָ֕ה <S%H7684><s%> as an error שֶׁיֹּצָ֖א <S%H3318><s%> [which] proceedeth מִלִּפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> from הַשַּׁלִּֽיט׃ <S%H7989><s%> the ruler

נִתַּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> is set הַסֶּ֔כֶל <S%H5529><s%> Folly בַּמְּרוֹמִ֖ים <S%H4791><s%> dignity רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> in great וַעֲשִׁירִ֖ים <S%H6223><s%> and the rich בַּשֵּׁ֥פֶל <S%H8216><s%> in low place יֵשֵֽׁבוּ׃ <S%H3427><s%> sit

רָאִ֥יתִי <S%H7200><s%> I have seen עֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> servants עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on סוּסִ֑ים <S%H5483><s%> upon horses וְשָׂרִ֛ים <S%H8269><s%> and princes הֹלְכִ֥ים <S%H1980><s%> walking כַּעֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> as servants עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth

חֹפֵ֥ר <S%H2658><s%> He that diggeth גּוּמָּ֖ץ <S%H1475><s%> a pit בּ֣וֹ יִפּ֑וֹל <S%H5307><s%> shall fall וּפֹרֵ֥ץ <S%H6555><s%> into it and whoso breaketh גָּדֵ֖ר <S%H1447><s%> an hedge יִשְּׁכֶ֥נּוּ <S%H5391><s%> shall bite נָחָֽשׁ׃ <S%H5175><s%> a serpent

מַסִּ֣יעַ <S%H5265><s%> Whoso removeth אֲבָנִ֔ים <S%H68><s%> stones יֵעָצֵ֖ב <S%H6087><s%> shall be hurt בָּהֶ֑ם בּוֹקֵ֥עַ <S%H1234><s%> therewith [and] he that cleaveth עֵצִ֖ים <S%H6086><s%> wood יִסָּ֥כֶן <S%H5533><s%> shall be endangered בָּֽם׃

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If קֵהָ֣ה <S%H6949><s%> be blunt הַבַּרְזֶ֗ל <S%H1270><s%> If the iron וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not פָנִ֣ים <S%H6440><s%> the edge קִלְקַ֔ל <S%H7043><s%> and he do not whet וַחֲיָלִ֖ים <S%H2428><s%> to more strength יְגַבֵּ֑ר <S%H1396><s%> then must he put וְיִתְר֥וֹן <S%H3504><s%> [is] profitable הַכְשֵׁ֖יר <S%H3787><s%> to direct חָכְמָֽה׃ <S%H2451><s%> but wisdom

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יִשֹּׁ֥ךְ <S%H5391><s%> will bite הַנָּחָ֖שׁ <S%H5175><s%> Surely the serpent בְּלוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> being לָ֑חַשׁ <S%H3908><s%> without enchantment וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there יִתְר֔וֹן <S%H3504><s%> is no better לְבַ֖עַל <S%H1167><s%> archer הַלָּשֽׁוֹן׃ <S%H3956><s%> babbler

דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> The words פִי־ <S%H6310><s%> mouth חָכָ֖ם <S%H2450><s%> of a wise man's חֵ֑ן <S%H2580><s%> [are] gracious וְשִׂפְת֥וֹת <S%H8193><s%> but the lips כְּסִ֖יל <S%H3684><s%> of a fool תְּבַלְּעֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H1104><s%> will swallow up

תְּחִלַּ֥ת <S%H8462><s%> The beginning דִּבְרֵי־ <S%H1697><s%> of the words פִ֖יהוּ <S%H6310><s%> of his mouth סִכְל֑וּת <S%H5531><s%> [is] foolishness וְאַחֲרִ֣ית <S%H319><s%> and the end פִּ֔יהוּ <S%H6310><s%> of his talk הוֹלֵל֖וּת <S%H1948><s%> madness רָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> [is] mischievous

וְהַסָּכָ֖ל <S%H5530><s%> A fool יַרְבֶּ֣ה <S%H7235><s%> also is full דְבָרִ֑ים <S%H1697><s%> of words לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> No יֵדַ֤ע <S%H3045><s%> cannot tell הָאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> a man מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what שֶׁיִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> will happen וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> what יִֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> will come מֵֽאַחֲרָ֔יו <S%H310><s%> what shall be and what shall be after מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> and who יַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> him who can tell לֽוֹ׃

עֲמַ֥ל <S%H5999><s%> The labour הַכְּסִילִ֖ים <S%H3684><s%> of the foolish תְּיַגְּעֶ֑נּוּ <S%H3021><s%> wearieth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> every one of them because he knoweth לָלֶ֥כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> to the city

אִֽי־ <S%H337><s%> Woe לָ֣ךְ אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to thee O land שֶׁמַּלְכֵּ֖ךְ <S%H4428><s%> when thy king נָ֑עַר <S%H5288><s%> [is] a child וְשָׂרַ֖יִךְ <S%H8269><s%> and thy princes בַּבֹּ֥קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning יֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> eat

אַשְׁרֵ֣יךְ <S%H835><s%> Blessed אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [art] thou O land שֶׁמַּלְכֵּ֖ךְ <S%H4428><s%> when thy king בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> [is] the son חוֹרִ֑ים <S%H2715><s%> of nobles וְשָׂרַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H8269><s%> and thy princes בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> in due season יֹאכֵ֔לוּ <S%H398><s%> eat בִּגְבוּרָ֖ה <S%H1369><s%> for strength וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> for בַשְּׁתִֽי׃ <S%H8358><s%> and not for drunkenness

בַּעֲצַלְתַּ֖יִם <S%H6103><s%> By much slothfulness יִמַּ֣ךְ <S%H4355><s%> decayeth הַמְּקָרֶ֑ה <S%H4746><s%> the building וּבְשִׁפְל֥וּת <S%H8220><s%> and through idleness יָדַ֖יִם <S%H3027><s%> of the hands יִדְלֹ֥ף <S%H1811><s%> droppeth through הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> the house

לִשְׂחוֹק֙ <S%H7814><s%> for laughter עֹשִׂ֣ים <S%H6213><s%> is made לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> A feast וְיַ֖יִן <S%H3196><s%> and wine יְשַׂמַּ֣ח <S%H8055><s%> makes חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> age וְהַכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> but money יַעֲנֶ֥ה <S%H6030><s%> answereth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּֽל׃ <S%H3605><s%> to everything

גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> Furthermore בְּמַדָּֽעֲךָ֗ <S%H4093><s%> no not in thy thought מֶ֚לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> not the king אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּקַלֵּ֔ל <S%H7043><s%> Curse וּבְחַדְרֵי֙ <S%H2315><s%> rooms מִשְׁכָּ֣בְךָ֔ <S%H4904><s%> your sleeping אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּקַלֵּ֖ל <S%H7043><s%> and curse עָשִׁ֑יר <S%H6223><s%> not the rich כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for ע֤וֹף <S%H5775><s%> for a bird הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> of the air יוֹלִ֣יךְ <S%H1980><s%> will carry אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקּ֔וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice וּבַ֥עַל <S%H1167><s%> and that which hath [הַכְּנָפַיִם כ] (כְּנָפַ֖יִם <S%H3671><s%> bird ק) יַגֵּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> shall tell דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> the matter
